mapper.select: SELECT xed.id, xed.student_id, xed.exercise_id, xed.article_id, xed.read_sentence_id, xed.student_audio_path, xed.integrity, xed.pronunciation, xed.fluency, xed.similar_score, xed.create_id, xed.create_date, xed.update_id, xed.update_date, xed.enable_flag, xrs.article_id, xrs.sentence_cont, xrs.sentence_mean, xrs.word_num, xrs.picture_path, xrs.audio_path FROM ( SELECT * FROM xl_exercise_detail xed WHERE exercise_id = #{exerciseId} ) xed LEFT JOIN xl_read_sentence xrs ON xed.id = xrs.id AND xed.student_id = #{studentId}

SELECT xed.id, xed.student_id, xed.article_id, xed.read_sentence_id, xed.exercise_id, xed.score, xed.student_audio_path, xed.create_id, xed.create_date, xed.enable_flag, xed.fluency, xed.integrity, xed.pronunciation, xed.similar_score, xrs.article_id, xrs.audio_path, xrs.`name`, xrs.sentence_cont, xrs.sentence_mean, xrs.word_num, xrs.picture_path FROM ( SELECT * FROM xl_exercise_detail WHERE exercise_id = #{exerciseId} AND student_id = #{studentId} AND id = #{detailId} ) xed LEFT JOIN xl_read_sentence xrs ON xed.read_sentence_id = xrs.id
